website_summaries.verdict: A fun towable tube that's designed to accommodate more than 1 rider. However, its longevity is questionable and it can be challenging to steer.
pros: Fun to ride, and can fit up to 3 people
Has attractive, sporty graphics that look great on the water
Not too difficult or time consuming to inflate
cons: Slow leaks are common, and it's not the easiest tube to steer

customer_reviews.title: This our Second One
customer_reviews.text: These tubes work great. We had the original 10 years before the bladder developed a leak. That was my fault for storing it folded up in the unheated garage in the winters. I recommend keeping them aired up so not to develop cracks in the bladder. The exterior cover is super tough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sized for 2 adults or 3 smaller children.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve gone through a few different brands of rafts. We pull this behind a wave runner with smaller teenagers and it works well. The girls have to move back on the raft to keep the front from going down when starting up - after that it’s fine. I gave it four stars for the more comfortable and durable handles. All other rafts have had to be replaced after one summer of hard use because the handles ripped apart. It didn’t get 5 stars only because this is not big enough for more than 2 teenagers and one 5 year old child. Even with that, it’s a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: j. sole

customer_reviews.title: Sporty tube, but it doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I have had 6 of these tubes. They are fun and sporty. Usually pull 2 tubes with two adults each or 3 kids each. But they consistently don't last as long as other tubes. The inner tube develops a leak and then the tube is useless. You get about 10 hours or less of use and then you have to replace. I am no longer purchasing this tube. Other tubes just last longer.
customer_reviews.author: loves books

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LAST 5 DAYS OF TUBING!!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this a week before we got our boat. It was mainly used to pull 13 and under kids that weigh less than 100lbs. It no longer holds air. I'm very disappointed in this product. Would like a replacement but Amazon says it's no longer eligible for a return. So, crappy service, it didn't last 5 days of tubing. The 4th time we tried it didn't hold air. We kept having to go back to the marina bc it was deflating. I'll never buy again and don't recommend anyone else should. Update: I emailed the seller. They didn't even respond! DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angie B.

customer_reviews.title: Leaked out of the box
customer_reviews.text: This is a seasonal product bought as a gift for my grandkids for Christmas. I inflated it out of the box over Memorial Day weekend and it would not inflate. I could hear the leak and on inspection on the top of the air bladder was a 1 inch slit, clearly a manufacturing defect. It came with a patch kit that I tried to apply without success. The patch kit was crap. This is a seasonal product. The window for return was January. Tubes are not used in northern Minnesota in January so there was no reason for inflating or testing it until its initial use 10 days ago. It should be replaced free of charge in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Park

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun! Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good tube!! Comfortable for 2 adults to ride or 2 10-year olds and an adult. It's a lot of fun and very durable. We've always owned the round tubes before but really love the design of this for multiple riders. Fun to zigzag the tube back and forth from the wake. Kids compete on who can hang on the longest. i've only had it for the summer so I can't tell you how long it will last but it has definitely been worth the money so far.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: We love this tube!
customer_reviews.text: Great tube! We've used it for 2 full days now at the lake and it's holding up perfectly. Granted, we're not doing a lot of rough riding but we've had several tubes over the years and the quality of this one appears as good as any we've had. It's a bit small for 3 adults. Best for 2 adults, or 1 adult with 2 kids, or 3 kids. The footstops on the rear of each side are a bonus for stability. The photo is of an adult woman on the right side, a 7 year old on the left side and 11 year old in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Gallopntrot

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and even worse customer service
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tube for our kids as a Christmas present. After waiting months for the water temp to warm, we finally inflated our new tube and put it in the water for the first time. We noticed a manufacture's default in one location but decided it was not worth returning and was likely just cosmetic. In our first trip around the lake another area on the tube ripped and that was the end of our tube. After multiple calls and e-mails attempting to replace our tube we have yet to even get a response. DISAPPOINTED ALL THE WAY AROUND!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube which holds up to towing 2 people within ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice tube which holds up to towing 2 people within the weight limits. No complaints here. However, at a certain speed when accelerating this thing takes a dive under water with the people holding on to the hand straps. This problem has been reported on another website already and I must confirm this. If you pull up the front hard during the acceleration process until you reach planing speed, and the guy driving the boat knows how to handle it, it's manageable/avoidable. I am thinking this is due to the center position of the rope which should be probably attached more towards the bottom to get some positive lift. Other than that the tube appears to be a sturdy product.
customer_reviews.author: Detail Obsessed Skunk

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and durability
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend purchasing a different tube. Was extremely disappointed when this tube didn’t last longer than a day. It was our first tube, wish I spent more time researching and reading reviews. Stay away from this product.
customer_reviews.author: April plas

customer_reviews.title: 3 hours total tubing on them, they both popped 20 minutes from each other.
customer_reviews.text: Tubes looked great, daughter was so excited for the new tubes to arrive right before we left for vacation. Had 2 teenage girls on each tube and 3 hours total tubing on them, they both popped 20 minutes from each other. Daughter was very disappointed tubing was shot for the rest of the weekend.... Not a happy tuber!
customer_reviews.author: J. Sochacki

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 person tube for 11-18yr olds & the price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, in new condition and as advertised. Easy to inflate & definitely best used for kids between ages of 11 - 18 that want a “wild” or “G-Force” type of ride! If ride comfort or stability is your primary goal for “older” adults or kids under 10, this is not the tube you want.
customer_reviews.author: OR Double dad

customer_reviews.title: Loved our old one
customer_reviews.text: Loved our old one, which lasted 3 years. Bought it a second time recently. Note that you need to have it pumped up pretty hard or kids knees will pinch/crease the tube when they board it and puncture it. Coughlans makes a great tube repair glue. I think fixing holes in tubes just goes along with the sport. But I've found it only happens when the tube is soft.
customer_reviews.author: Dano

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: Very good well-made four passenger tube. I pull my kids and their friends all the time on this too. Update: only 1 year later and all the handles are torn off. Tube no longer stays inflated. I would have expected this to last much longer. We did use it quite a bit and it worked great for the first few months. But took it out for the new season and I find myself in need of purchasing a new tube! Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good Fun
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write a review until we got to used this item. The maiden voyage went great. My girls found it easy to hold on to, and said the foot pegs were super handy as they tried to hang on. I can't speak to long-term durability yet, but out of the box it seems to be very well made. We rode it hard yesterday and it held up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: LightGuru

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I'd thought
customer_reviews.text: Good, but smaller than I'd thought. If you're kids are over 14 or so, they might complain that there isn't enough room for 3. I think there is, but it's smaller than others that accommodate 3 people. Certainly a squeeze for 3 adults.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Stayin

customer_reviews.title: Loses air
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tube June 16th, and did receive it in time for 4th of July week of family fun. It did not seem to retain air, and took a nose dive upon start up with little ones on board. So we filled it again. We went to use it again this past weekend and it had lost a lot of air again, we filled it twice over the weekend and it continues to lose air. Our last tube held air between seasons.
customer_reviews.author: CRue

customer_reviews.title: This tube is the greatest. It rides on the water very well and ...
customer_reviews.text: This tube is the greatest. It rides on the water very well and accommodates 2 average sized riders perfectly. I haven't had 3 people on the tube, soI can't assess pulling 3. It is well constructed and made of high quality materials. I had a problem with my tube because I accidentally over inflated it. When I reported the problem to Airhead and they replaced the tube under warranty!! What a GREAT COMPANY!!! I made the mistake and they help me when they didn't have to. I got the best deal on a great tube, from a GREAT Company!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Larry V Chatman

customer_reviews.title: ... out to fill with air noted the bottom looked like it was dragged on a floor that had grease ...
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it and layed it out to fill with air noted the bottom looked like it was dragged on a floor that had grease on it lots of gray dirty stains. Used ???? not sure looked like it was packed ok seconds ???? Keep it because the grandkids were on there way if I had purchased it from a store would of returned it but what the heck it was stained on the bottom . Fast forward a week used it once with the grandkids (they loved it) Went to the garage to use it today only to discover almost all the air has leaked out . Hope the next one looks new and holds air ......
customer_reviews.author: will smith

customer_reviews.title: Making great memories
customer_reviews.text: The nieces and nephews have had a blast with this. Just make sure if riding solo you put all your weight in the back and pull up on the front when taking off. Otherwise it tries to become a submarine.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Very fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and fun tube. I got the one for 4 people, but it can hold 4 small people and 3 regular sized people. It does not work for one or 2 people. It gets unbalanced easily and flips over. Also, when it first starts pulling it will drag you underwater so you have to pull up. Overall this is a great tube and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mike McCaleb

customer_reviews.title: Great to toss around some teenage boys!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tube! Easy to inflate (one big spot and two smaller ones on the wings). I put two teenage boys on it and ripped them around behind the boat. They had a ton of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Great 2 person tube
customer_reviews.text: Great two person tube. The kids love it. It's light and easy to inflate. The handles are spaced a little funny, but that's only an issue if they really have to hang on. It's a great tube and looks like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: 'Zilla

customer_reviews.title: Favorite tube ever
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this, and so do I. The little "wings" in the back are great to prop your leg against to stay on. Great ride, durable, perfect. This is my second one of these. The first lasted about 100 rides and 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Tube
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we've purchased this brand and style of tube. It is easy to inflate and deflate. We purchased our first one 10 years ago and it just became too worn. I figured if it lasted that long it was worth it to purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy...VERY DISAPPOINTED!
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTED!!!! First time we used it, it kept losing air. Had to stop several times to make sure the cap was on all the way and sealed. Tried to use it with only 2 people our second visit to the lake and it still kept losing air. We bought the smaller red one that fit 3 people 5 years ago and it lasted over 4 years. Again this only lasted an hour. Not sure if I could return at this point but will certainly try.
customer_reviews.author: Kozigen

customer_reviews.title: Tears At Corners Within A Month
customer_reviews.text: Within a month the tube developed tears on the same spot of both back corners. Thank goodness for Flex Tape because the kids absolutely love riding on it! I just wish we didn’t have to keep taping it up!
customer_reviews.author: Bagheeboo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Very well put together. Kids love it and it's got plenty of room for two people. Durable, fun and easy to use. Jacked that the colors match the jet ski!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Lee

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tube
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tube! We tube a lot and flip the kids into another dimension on this thing! Super strong and comfortable for 2 riders. Love the red color!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Fun for everyone. Even the boat driver!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage kids love it. The support fins at the rear corners help riders stay on. Although, everyone loves to fall off into the lake! Durable construction which easily supported 300 pounds. The factory-installed plastic clip is great too so there is no need to buy the Kwik-Connect Tow Rope Connector for this tube. I paired this with the Bling two-rider rope and it's a perfect combination.
customer_reviews.author: Zippy

customer_reviews.title: Held up just fine
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 man tube since I was concerned about weight limit with 2 adults. Had a fun day pulling my daughters and their boyfriends around. Hopefully it will be just as good 2nd time we use it. Concerned about storage and whether to keep air in it or just fold it up. Decisions, decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large tube
customer_reviews.text: Nice tube, pretty big. The size makes it perfect for 2 12 yr old boys, but not as muck fun for only one as it doesnt swing out as easily because of some law of physics
customer_reviews.author: LukeSkywooker

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tube. We have had it out about 6 times and is holding up great. Will update if things change.
customer_reviews.author: Mom life

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this tube!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love this tube! It took them a little getting used to. It tends to submarine when you start off so they figured out how to stay on the back until we pick up enough speed.. good buy for the money
customer_reviews.author: creekin13

customer_reviews.title: We’ve been having a blast!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for. We pull this behind our Yamaha Waverunner and have so much fun!
customer_reviews.author: Makayla Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Assurance
customer_reviews.text: Used this once on the water for about 3 hours and stitching started to pull out where the rope attaches. To make matters worse, they want to charge me for returns and restocking fee. Will never buy from Outdoor Deals again. My bad for buying from a company that doesn't commit to making sure the customer gets what they paid for...quality product
customer_reviews.author: Holbert House

customer_reviews.title: Great ride, Concerning wear
customer_reviews.text: OK, build quality, rides great. Is a blast and kids love it. Used by 10/12/14 year olds. Fraying/tearing on valve cover some wear on tube after 2 weeks light use. Overall a little concerned as my older tubes never showed wear like this after 10 year.(but the inner tubes did let go after 10 years)
customer_reviews.author: David Schardt

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: So much fun. Can fit 3 small kiddos. Or 2 teens/adults. Might be hard for little kids to get up on.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mullin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a blast! We've had other towables and the quality of this particular one is great, not to mention the price was fantastic. We go to the lake every weekend and have towed two teenage boys around the whole lake, doing some pretty fast turns/curves with no issues whatsoever. It's very well made with durable materials. Through the whole summer we never had to add more air or had any tearing. The only issue worth noting is you DO have to be careful when taking off.....it will submerge easily if you don't lean back holding the handles.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnygirl

customer_reviews.title: Nice tube
customer_reviews.text: Very good tube. It is bigger than I expected. Easily tows 4 children, comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: yes stupid, but when it works it is a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Stay away!! I bought one that lasted 3 years and it got a hole. I tried everything I could to repair but no luck. So I bought another one, yes stupid, but when it works it is a good tube. This one lasted just over a year, of course the 1 year warranty expired. Now this is a one year warranty on a seasonal item. So we maybe used it for 3 months before we got a hole in the same exact place as the first one. Find something else, $180 for 4 months of use is robbery!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We have had this tube 31 days and it busted after 3 uses! The return window ended yesterday! This is so frustrating as these are not cheap!! Would not buy another
customer_reviews.author: Christy D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Really a great float
customer_reviews.text: This is the favorite float in our collection. It easily holds 3 teenagers (girls - don't know how it would work with 18 yr old boys) and the front stays up so they did not get water in their faces. It is heavy weight and looks like it will last for a while. My only complaint is that when I ordered it Amazon recommended AIRHEAD AHKC-1 KWIK-CONNECT Tube Rope Connector. I ordered it, but it is not needed. The towable comes with its own, so I guess I wasted a little money there.
customer_reviews.author: Here is my honest opinion

customer_reviews.title: I think these are more durable than other towables, but I'm back shopping again
customer_reviews.text: I've had 2 of these over the last 4 years. I have a friend who has had 2 of them and they lasted 6-8 years or so. I think they are a little more durable than average but I'm not really seeing a difference. I tried to repair them with aquaseal but neither seems to have held. I'm back shopping again. They do ride well and don't scuff elbows as much as other tubes.
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: I go through one of these every year but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I go through one of these every year but I use it every day of the year. I live in tropical weather and use this for commercial use and we put it to the limits, so if you're just going to use this a few times a year then this would last you for years after years.
customer_reviews.author: Aztec K.

customer_reviews.title: Superior reliability from a brand name that you can trust!
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and excellent performance for cutting through the water.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: G Force Inflatable
customer_reviews.text: Tube arrived very quickly. Upon inflating one of the small air bladders had a crack near the fill valve. I contacted Customer Service very few questions asked. They asked me to provide proof of purchase and fill out a claim form. That was all reasonable, but my surprise came when she replaced the entire tube. New tube arrived within 2 days. Talk about great Customer Service. The tube worked fine without the missing air bladder. The kids love this tube, pulls easily and well constructed. I would buy again. But I will definatly buy from this company again. It is rare to find customer service like this. I rate them A+++++++.
customer_reviews.author: qapd

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement
customer_reviews.text: This tube replaced a 3 person Airhead after 7 years. Got the smaller one because it is easier to handle in the boat. It is smaller, but not too small. The grandchildren are pre-teen and it is big enough for two of them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wargo

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk - wast of money
customer_reviews.text: No matter what you do, as soon as the boat begins to pull this crappy tube, the front of it where the rope connects goes under the water and whoever is on the tube goes into the water. Poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: If it held air would be great
customer_reviews.text: Great tube, kids loved it the first couple uses. Never held air, had to add air every use from day one. After only about four times on the lake, went completely flat. Never over inflated, used airheads pump with relief valve. Airhead claims they have a one year warranty. We will see. Update. Airhead sent me a brand new replacement. All good
customer_reviews.author: haz

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality and size of this tube. My boys are young teens and both fit comfortably. They can also fit a 3rd person although 2 is preferred.
customer_reviews.author: ANWoodall

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works like it should, kids love to get on it.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Erdely

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Bought it early for what I thought would be a fun spring and summer. By the 3rd time using it 2 punctures. Would recommend against this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, great price & they have held up great with hours and hours of tubing. Teenage boys can be rough on items...but this one has lasted for two seasons so far & I have no doubt it will continue to last. You can easily fit 3 people on it. Only downfall is when going too slow, the kids have to pull back on the front or else it will go under water.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Osgood

customer_reviews.title: Strong and handles reckless teenage boys!
customer_reviews.text: We easily pull two teenage boys (150lbs each) behind Sea Doo GTI-SE 130 and Wake 155. Rough choppy conditions + crazy teenagers = hours of fun! No signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Mick in Florida

customer_reviews.title: TOP OF THE LINE TUBE
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tube at the start of the summer and I will say without a doubt that we have had a blast with it. This product is high quality for the price and we have used it far more than normal. We live on a lake and make use of this tube several times a week and with multiple riders. It has been through the mill with hundreds of hours of use and is still like new. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LARRY D.  SAMPLE

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Our last one broke inside and turned into UFO. So far this one had been great.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in July of last year and only used it a couple of times. The first time we used it this year, it wouldn't stay inflated. Waste of almost $200. We haven't even had it a year yet!
customer_reviews.author: Asheboro customer

customer_reviews.title: Tube failed after only a few uses
customer_reviews.text: We were very dissapointed when the tube started to leak. Checked all valves and tried to submerge to find bubbles to attempt repair, but no luck. We were careful with the tube and no damage is apparent, yet the tube does no longer hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bastida

customer_reviews.title: Fun towable for teens and adults
customer_reviews.text: Teens and adults loved it... When starting it goes under water unless we accelerate the boat quickly. This did not happen with the previous towable (bonzai) and it has taken some time for everyone to get used to this. if anyone knows how to prevent this towable from going under water without accelerating the boat, would love to know. Other than the above quirk, we are all happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Al Barkley

customer_reviews.title: Popped twice, not even 1 year old
customer_reviews.text: Actually like the product a lot but it keeps popping on the seam. Not cut from sharp objects, but rather just 1-2cm tears on a seam Patched 1 hole. Patch held. It then popped again about 5” to the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD AIR
customer_reviews.text: First time out of the box and the tube would not hold air. Seemed to be a slow leak due to poor quality manufacturing. Just missed the return window, as the weather had not been favorable for boating, so I will have to eat the loss. Utterly disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fun for a family
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fun for a family! the quality is good so far - no problems, hope will last. the handles are comfy to hold on to, big enough for enough room.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Solid tube - fits 3 people well
customer_reviews.text: Since I got this tube I've used it 3 times and its holding together well. No tearing or splitting anywhere. The handles are very comfortable to use and the back fins really help you stay on, especially when flying around turns outside the wake. Its easy and fast to attach the rope to with the Qwik Connect attachment. 3 people fit on this tube well. It is on the larger side for our boat but works very well.
customer_reviews.author: cnelson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice equipment delivered right on time
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good quality for multiple riders. Fun for many age groups!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K Ley

customer_reviews.title: Slippery when wet
customer_reviews.text: The kids said it was slippery like it had soap on it. Hopefully that will go away.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy H.

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps I expect too much
customer_reviews.text: Do any towables last longer than one summer? It is always the bladders. We use them for 50-60 hours a summer with between 275-350 pounds on them. They tend to submarine at slow speeds when you are transitioning in and out the no wake zones. However, they plane out easily and ride great. The handle configuration is pretty good. The fan tails help folks stay on. The covers have been durable. I keep buying them for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, though bulky to deflate and store
customer_reviews.text: It inflates easily. It's a ton of fun. I mostly just ride 2 adults on it, as 3 might be a little snug. But it's a blast. I've bought other Airhead products and used them for a few months and they're strong and reliable. They're kind of a pain to deflate and fit back on the boat because you can't shrink them back down easily to the original size, and the inner tube moves around inside the outside shell.
customer_reviews.author: Fabian A

customer_reviews.title: Great tube
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tube. We got it on the recommendation of a friend who has had one for years. We put it through a lot of stress and it stood up wonderfully. Its one problem is its tendency to submarine when no one is on it or when towing people at slow speeds. That would not be a problem with a higher harness but the hooks on our boat are very close to the waterline. The two fins at he back as well as the extra hand straps right in front of those fins helped keep our riders on the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jacques Guillot

customer_reviews.title: this is the one the daughter was able to maneuver and manipulate and ride the waves with to her satisfaction and fun. she's adve
customer_reviews.text: this is the tube we owned for a full summer and half of constant use before the cover tore. ordered 3 different ones to replace it but none were the "one". this is the one the daughter was able to maneuver and manipulate and ride the waves with to her satisfaction and fun. she's adventurous and we finally reordered!
customer_reviews.author: DebySu

customer_reviews.title: Great tube, awesome fun
customer_reviews.text: Great tube, awesome fun, and has been reliable for about a year now. We use mostly for 2 people, but it does good with 3 too. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far but seems good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Fun filled wave tube
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected date given at order summary. Only used 2 days (in a row) thus far but plans for many more. Durable material & plugs. Fits 3 people comfortably- kids and or adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 or 3 riders
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. We usually have to get a couple each summer as we beat them up pretty good. This one lasted all summer. Seems air head has upped their quality??
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey C.

customer_reviews.title: It is a good float, well built
customer_reviews.text: It is a good float, well built, cool design. Now it does not allow any combination of speed and weight on it. After couple runs, water enters into the liner and increase the weight, so the float dives in when starting the boat. Need to balance your weight to not sink at start. A good product but not for kids or light people.
customer_reviews.author: Stephane

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very Fun Product. Spent the week with the family and we used this daily! It was a blast and the kids loved every second of it
customer_reviews.author: Every Miles A Memory

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest price I could find
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Fast delivery. Good quality. Can not ask for a better product for price, comfort and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great but I noticed when you have more than one adult rider it can deflate a little while bouncing
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Too small for 3 full grown teens....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tube due to the great reviews that I sae on Amazon. Just wanted to state that tube could not comfortably fit 3 older teenagers/adult. It was perfect for two riders, but for three full grown teens (average build) they were literally ontop of each other inorder to not to fall off sides off tube. Only lasted one run with three.
customer_reviews.author: Richrugby

customer_reviews.title: Great tube - holds 4 kids ages 8-12 with no ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tube - holds 4 kids ages 8-12 with no problems! Only feedback would be to have a way to keep the inflator hole lined up with protective cover casing - has a tendency to move as you inflate / use! Great quality passed our full summer test! Would purchase again if we had too!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: A Tube that lasts and can take a beating
customer_reviews.text: This Tube has now lasted 2 summers at our lake place. It has withstood a beating and lots and lots of use with as many as 3 adults riding behind it. It still looks good, has not faded, and all of the handles are still in place with no sign of wear. I highly recommend this tube as it skips across the water great, holds air, and has a tough exterior that seems to be very fade resistant.
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEW

customer_reviews.title: Good price! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this Airhead Towable for use in the bay near Panama City, FL. Our first riders were 2 normal-size adults, who had a blast skimming and bouncing, until their arms got weary from hanging on! It was quick to inflate, easy to hook up to the boat, and offered an exciting ride! We were told this was one of the best activities of their Florida vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Nana B.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tube to pull with my jet ski for my 2 boys...they are 7 and 13. Both are smaller kids so not a whole lot of weight. They were able to ride it twice. It now has a hole in the seam of the inflatable part and goes flat very quickly. It was a good product and easy to pull but does not stay together to make it worth the price. I do not recommend this product it is a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Great family toy
customer_reviews.text: All of us used this tube for hours, lot of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Stable and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Much easier for the kids to keep on and have fun on (or vice versa) than others.
customer_reviews.author: MobieOne

customer_reviews.title: Great Tube!
customer_reviews.text: Others had commented on submarining on starts with this tube, so far not once. This is a well made product and looks like it should last a long time. I did not give it five stars only because I haven't had it long enough to determine how durable it will actually be in the long haul. I would definitely by this again given what I know now.
customer_reviews.author: JPShooter

customer_reviews.title: First weekend we used for 2 hours and was great. Second weekend
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two weeks ago. First weekend we used for 2 hours and was great. Second weekend, first use it lasted 15 mins and went flat. We were very careful not to overinflate due to other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Dad

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews before purchasing!
customer_reviews.text: We used this one summer with no more then 3 (small) youths only. Inflated it the following summer, would not hold the air. We took very good care storing it! Very disappointed in the product. Will seek other brand for next one.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Burby

customer_reviews.title: Great tube
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this year. I am hoping it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box
customer_reviews.text: What a piece of crap. Bought it 7/1, just took it out of the box to use on 8/5 for the first time and it leaks. Good luck trying to return a defective product 5 days after the the 30 day window, even if it's never touched water. Will not hold air.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Fun tubes
customer_reviews.text: We've used it for about a month. We bought 2, but one of them developed a split in a seam fairly quickly so we returned it to Amazon. Amazon refunded our money (very quickly) because this product was out of stock. We still love the one we have and the teenagers really love it. We're hoping this one will last a few years.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bouwhuis

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold air.
customer_reviews.text: Neoprene at handles unraveled quickly and the tube looses air somewhere since new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it this summer
customer_reviews.text: Durable. The kids loved it this summer. It might be too small for 3 adults.
customer_reviews.author: WWII  son

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: The tube is too small doesn't have much buoyancy tries to go under water every time you take off.
customer_reviews.author: TexasBabe

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This is to replace one that laste only two years of hard but infrequent tubing. I wish you could just replace the inner tube.
customer_reviews.author: Loose on the Palouse

customer_reviews.title: This is the kids favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My kids (21, 15, 9) love this. It is well made and if you only buy one towable this should be it. Instruct your riders to lean back not forward when stopping... they will figure this out. lol But again if you plan on only having one inflatable ... this is the one to get.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie J

customer_reviews.title: Deflates quickly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this without checking the return policy of 30 days. It came May 12th and I didn't actually take it out of the box until June 15th to use it. The first time in the water it seemed to loose some a it but I just thought it's rally hot maybe it deflated a little bit. Ever since it looses air everyone I use it and it is getting worse each time. It's a lot of fUn when it's actually inflated but be sure to use it immediately so you can return it if it has a flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great on the water though
customer_reviews.text: It came looking a little worn, but I'm going to assume that it was from the shipping process. works great on the water though.
customer_reviews.author: Andy H.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nose diver
customer_reviews.text: Seen a review about this tube submarineing during throttle up, it does! We even drug it with no one on it and it went under. Frustrating when your trying to have fun. The quality of the materials seemed great, just couldn't get it to perform.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: kids love this and so far it seems to take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

product_meta.title: Airhead G-Force | 1-4 Rider Towable Tube for Boating
feature_bullets: Kwik-Connect - Airhead's patented Kwik-Connect for quick and easy rope connection
Fully Covered - Heavy-duty full nylon cover
Bolster Fins - Keeps riders secure while tubing
Padded Handles - Non-slip cushioned handles providing comfort and stability
